DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Objective tumor response nivolumab patient previously treat recurrent and/or metastatic nasopharyngeal carcinoma ( NPC ) base Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) criteria version 1.1 . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I. Tumor response nivolumab base immune-related response criterion ( IRC ) . II . Duration response . III . Progression-free survival overall survival . IV .
